mapper.select: select id, real_id as realId, type, (select year from exam_real where id = real_id) as realName, (select count(1) from exam_real_question where exam_real_id = real_id) as countAll, all_question_id as allQuestion, do_question_id as doQuestion, update_date as updateDate, create_date as createDate from exam_record where user_id = #{userId} and exam_id = #{examId} and detail_id = #{detailId} and subject_id = #{subjectId} order by create_date desc
